channel.title: Comments on: Nest Thermostat Review, Update #5

item.title: By: Nest Thermostat Review, Update #4 - WiredPrairie
item.dc:creator: Nest Thermostat Review, Update #4 - WiredPrairie

item.title: By: chris
item.dc:creator: chris
item.description:
Thanks for posting your experience. I've been tempted to buy a (stupidly overpriced) nest on ebay and am sure glad I didn't.
i hope they can get it right, as the promise is compelling. with an internet enabled product they should be able fix all of your insightful gripes with a software update.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for posting your experience. I’ve been tempted to buy a (stupidly overpriced) nest on ebay and am sure glad I didn’t.

i hope they can get it right, as the promise is compelling. with an internet enabled product they should be able fix all of your insightful gripes with a software update.
